alert.note: Alert for Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 18 at 3:46AM CDT until March 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Watch tonight, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. For the Freeze Watch Sunday night, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Perry and Greene Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Sunday morning. For the second Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
